channel.title: Wtf no player/npc clipping!

item.title: Wtf no player/npc clipping!
item.dc:creator: @emo_skill emo skill
item.description:
@emo_skill wrote:

own master:

damn then im screwd but isn’t there a client sided thingy that fixes all no clipping??

You can prevent players from noclipping by taking that out of your client but it does not affect npcs.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf no player/npc clipping!
item.dc:creator: @own_master own master
item.description:
@own_master wrote:

HcoJustin:

Do they walk through the walls when they’re just freely walking? Or is it when they decide to pursue a player. If its only when in pursuit use the method that calculates their next walkable tile and use that for following. Otherwise you will have to add every object that exists in game and use those for calculations

damn then im screwd but isn’t there a client sided thingy that fixes all no clipping??

Read full topic
